_header: Awake lords awake and take good heed
Note: See 6279 for a Lancastrian version of the same events
_description: On the Policy of the Yorkish Lords (c. 1460) — twenty-four couplets

TCD432.First Lines:
Awake lordes awake & take goode hedeffor som þat speke ful
                    fayre þei wolde your evil spede…
TCD432.Last Lines:
…With al oþer lordes trewe to youre assentHer sheld be
                    euer god omnipotent
TCD432.Attributed Title:
On the policy to be observed by the Yorkists (added by modern hand, f.
                        69v)
TCD432.Editions:
Madden,  Frederick. 
             “Political Poems of the Reigns of Henry VI and Edwrd IV.”

             Mittelenglische Dichtungen aus der Handschrift 432 des Trinity College
                in Dublin.
         Halle: Niemeyer, 1940: 128-9.
Robbins,  Rossell Hope,
                        ed.  
             Historical Poems of the XIV and XV Centuries.
         New York: Columbia UP, 1959: 206-7.
